Class Rectangle

java.lang.Object
Shape
ConvexPolygon
Rectangle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Shape>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Square
public class Rectangle extends ConvexPolygon
Concrete definition of a rectangle defined using the inherited properties of ConvexPolygon.

  • Constructor Details

    • Rectangle

      public Rectangle(int width, int height, Point position, Color color, boolean isFilled)
      Constructs a rectangle with the given width, height, position, color, and isFilled properties.
      Parameters:
      width - width of the rectangle
      height - height of the rectangle
      position - position of the rectangle
      color - Color of the rectangle
      isFilled - true if filled, false if only wireframed

  • Method Details

    • setVertex

      public void setVertex(int index, Point vertex)
      Overrides ConvexPolygon.setVertex(int, Point) and throws UnsupportedOperationException.
      Overrides:
      setVertex in class ConvexPolygon
      Parameters:
      index - index for the desired vertex (no significance).
      vertex - desired vertex of the convex polygon (no significance).
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - since setting an arbitrary vertex for a rectangle does not make sense.
